alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Muskogee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 3:28PM CDT until August 28 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MCINTOSH AND CENTRAL MUSKOGEE COUNTIES... At 327 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Lake Eufaula State Park to 5 miles southwest of Warner, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Checotah... Warner... Webbers Falls... Oktaha... Rentiesville... Lake Eufaula State Park... Keefeton... Onapa... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 256 and 283. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
